RR-NE, 

I do thank you for your work here however Wikipedia has been corrected (mostly not by me). And this time it actually has a tru and reliable source for the information - the company that own truTV. According to Turner Broadcasting season 6 starts on 10 July 2012, which means this is only HALF of season 5. Sorry for being a bringer of bad news but i thought better to know than to not know. Maybe title the next compilation Season 5 Part 2. 

And on another note, in case you haven't seen it already, i have put up a torrent of the two pilot episodes. It is labelled Season 00. I still can't believe the guy's explanation for why he bit a co-worker.
